item.description:
NEW STUFF:

The movie starts at 7:00, so let's meet outside the theater (under the marquis) by 6:30. If you're on your way and know you'll be late, text or call me, please.

RSVPs are open until 5:00 on Tuesday, so feel free to join us if you haven't RSVPed already.

--Dana

508/308-4897

Â 

OLD STUFF:

If you're into Marvel Comics, if you're into fantasy flicks, if you're into adventure films, or if you like badasses, The Avengers is the most anticipated movie of its kind in years. Combining all your favorite heroes (Iron Man, Thor, The Hulk, Captain America, among others), it promises to kick Bad Boy Tushy. Bring it!

SUMMARY:

Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk, Thor, Captain America, Hawkeye and Black Widow answer the call to action when Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., initiates a daring, globe-spanning recruitment effort to assemble The Avengers team to defeat an unexpected enemy threatening global safety and security. Despite pulling together the ultimate dream team, Nick Fury and longtime confidant Agent Coulson must find a way to convince the Super Heroes to work with, not against each other, when the powerful and dangerous Loki gains access to the Cosmic Cube and its unlimited power.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right outside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays or Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for The Avengers!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: The Avengers
